attributes.action: consider awarding David G. Bradley of Norwich an M.B.E., at least, for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: copious wine consumption, supporting Norwich city in times of adversity, being a role model to boy bands, the best player never to have represented England (at anything!), once buying a round and generally being a good bloke!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
